section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Board" means the Board of County Commissioners of Cecil County.
"Program" means the Volunteer Length of Service Award Program.

text.section: In Cecil County, the Board may establish and fund a Volunteer Length of Service Award Program for qualified members of volunteer fire departments, rescue squads, and ambulance corps.

section.section: The Board may adopt bylaws for the Program by resolution.
A surviving spouse benefit is discontinued when the survivor remarries.
